faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about learning journey in Space2Study as a tutor
faq.findStudentDescription: Finding the right student starts with completing your tutor profile. Make sure your information is clear, relevant, and showcases your experience. Use the platform’s filters to match with students who are looking for your expertise.
faq.fillTutorProfile: How to fill out a tutor’s profile
faq.fillTutorProfileDescription: A well-filled tutor profile increases your visibility and credibility. Add a professional photo, describe your teaching approach, specify the subjects you teach, and mention your availability. Keep your information updated for the best results.
faq.rulesDescription: Tutors are expected to respect the platform’s guidelines. Always maintain professional communication, deliver lessons as agreed, and avoid sharing or using copyrighted materials without permission. Refrain from inappropriate content or behavior.
faq.getPaid: How you can be paid for lessons
faq.getPaidDescription: You and the student agree on payment terms during the cooperation setup. Space2Study does not charge commission fees. Ensure clear communication about the payment method, frequency, and conditions for a smooth experience.
